title: The Jazz Are Listening
description:
Michael Wilbon and Frank Isola discuss if it would be smart for the Jazz to trade Donovan Mitchell, if Kevin Durant’s trade request is bad for the NBA and if the “Pie Slice Rule” would be good for baseball. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Tony Kornheiser, Michael Wilbon
itunes:subtitle: PTI: The Jazz are open to Donovan Mitchell trades and is the "Pie Slice Rule" the future of baseball?
